name: Yukon Escape
description:
My entry for the 2-Buttons Jam! Yukon Escape is a side-scroller game where you dodge various obstacles. 

Set in the cold and treacherous Yukon Mountains, you must be able to quickly dodge forests, obstacles, and keep a watch for debris and fractures! Or...be a daredevil and try to score points by narrowly missing them!

This game is an entry for the 2-Buttons Jam, which can be found here: 2-Buttons Jam 2020

Controls:

AMove LeftDMove Right

Gameplay elements:

Ordinary obstacles. These are trees, rocks, and holes that you must avoid! Or...try to narrowly miss them to gain points.Fractures .These are cracks in the ground that gradually open up. Keep an eye out for them!Debris. These will rain down on the field very quickly with little to no warning! Keep an eye out!

I hope you all enjoy the game! Let me know what you think in the comments below!
